content: Here's an excellent summary of one of my favorite books (Working Effectively with Legacy Code by Michael Feathers): https://understandlegacycode.com/blog/key-points-of-working-effectively-with-legacy-code/
Feel free to share your own favorite programming books
I am following this ray tracing book and it's great. https://raytracing.github.io/books/RayTracingInOneWeekend.html
Have anyone ever gone through this book?
